channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: AI boom to beat electricity and PCs, $200B investment by 2025: Goldman Sachs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Economists from Goldman Sachs predict that AI investment could account for up to 4% of GDP in the United States by 2025.

item.title: Australian financial regulator sues eToro over ‘volatile’ trading products
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The Australian Securities and Investments Commission alleged eToro users with no understanding of CFD product risks could still buy them on the platform.

item.title: KPMG touts ESG benefits from Bitcoin, counters misperceptions in new report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The report compares Bitcoin energy usage to that of clothes dryers (equal) and its emissions to those of manure (much less) in a slight but readable document.

item.title: Robinhood turns profitable in Q2, but crypto revenue declines
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Robinhood achieved profitability for the first time since becoming a public company in the second quarter of 2023. Its crypto revenue, however, continues to decline.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Curve emergency DAO terminates rewards for hack-related pools
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The Curve emergency DAO removed CRV rewards for alETH, msETH, pETH, crvCRVETH, Arbitrum Tricrypto and multiBTC pools.

item.title: Protocol to identify ‘systemically important’ blockchain banks could help prevent a market crash: Study
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: After the collapse of Terra, the digital assets sector needed a way to identify critical nodes in the global DeFi community.

item.title: Aave price takes double-digit hit, but strong fundamentals point to eventual recovery
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: The Aave price may have been impacted by this week’s Curve Finance scandal, but a robust insurance fund and steady fee revenue could protect against further downside.

item.title: Subscribers on X (formerly Twitter) can hide their blue check marks now
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Twitter Help warns that other users may still be able to tell if they're a subscriber.

item.title: What is Metcalfe’s Law, and why does it matter?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Onkar Singh
item.description: Metcalfe’s Law suggests that the more people who use a cryptocurrency, the more valuable and useful it becomes.

item.title: MIT Digital Currency Initiative introduces at-scale, programmable CBDC platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: PArSEC — short for “parallelized architecture for scalably executing smart contracts” — runs on the ERC-20 standard, so it could have other applications, too.

item.title: Art, history and Bruce Lee in the metaverse, food brands use NFTs: Nifty Newsletter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: NFT company Yuga Labs is set to acquire a metaverse-building startup to advance its Otherside metaverse project.

item.title: Binance’s CZ warns crypto community about emerging scam
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: The scheme consists of mirroring addresses and sending dust transactions to users to trick them into sending funds to the scammer’s wallet.

item.title: Price analysis 8/2: BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, DOGE, ADA, SOL, MATIC, LTC, DOT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin is witnessing a strong battle between the bulls and the bears, with the sellers currently holding a slight edge.

item.title: US DoJ is concerned about a run on Binance should prosecutors bring fraud charges: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Officials reportedly speculated an indictment against Binance in the U.S. could cause a run on the exchange similar to what happened with crypto exchange FTX in November 2022.

item.title: Web3 startups queue up: Consensys Startup Program partners with Cointelegraph Accelerator
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serkan Keskin
item.description: Cointelegraph Accelerator participants will get a headstart with Consensys’ Web3 solutions, including MetaMask, Infura and Linea zkEVM.

item.title: Ukrainian government reports $81M tax loss from unregulated crypto exchanges since 2013
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: A crypto bill signed into law in 2022 paved the way for the Ukrainian government to amend its tax code, but local exchanges still largely operate outside this framework.

item.title: Decentralized Web3 data service taps ZK-proofs for tamper-proof SQL queries
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Space and Time launches zero-knowledge proof tool for its decentralized database platform.

item.title: Litecoin halving completes as LTC sees increased payments adoption
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Litecoin block rewards have now halved to 6.25 LTC as the halving clock is reset for another four years.

item.title: KuCoin suspends Bitcoin and Litecoin mining pools
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “We deeply regret any inconvenience this might cause and we remain grateful for your unwavering support and understanding," the exchange wrote.

item.title: Why is Bitcoin price stuck?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: why is bitcoin price not moving
item.description: Bitcoin is a volatile asset, but BTC price can stay flat for days, weeks and even months for various reasons.

item.title: Blockchain IoT firm Nodle goes open source with Web3 Bluetooth ‘nanocomputer’ sticker
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Nodle unveils open-source Bluetooth ‘nanocomputer’ N1 sticker aimed at increasing IoT connectivity across industries.

item.title: ICP-based blockchain chat app launches ‘Communities’ to compete with Discord
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: OpenChat implemented a new feature that allows admins to create groups within groups, similar to Discord’s channels within servers.

item.title: Deposit risk: What do crypto exchanges really do with your money?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: While depositing may be easy, what some crypto exchanges do with your money behind the scenes can range from concerning to criminal.

item.title: Worldcoin to allow government and businesses to use ID system: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: New reports reveal that Worldcoin plans to expand its operations to sign up more users by allowing organizations and governments to access its technology.

item.title: ETF analyst raises spot Bitcoin ETF approval chances in the US to 65%
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The ETF analyst predicted that recent developments in the Ripple vs. SEC case and the upcoming Grayscale lawsuit would be crucial to the first spot Bitcoin ETF approval.

item.title: Exploring the future of AI: The power of decentralization
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Victoria Kennedy
item.description: Although it’s still in its infancy, decentralized AI could be the answer to many technological concerns.

item.title: Mixed signals: Binance denies reports of $90B in crypto trades in China
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Binance has refuted claims published in The Wall Street Journal that the exchange has conducted billions of dollars in crypto-related business in China, despite the country’s crypto ban.

item.title: How to detect fake news with natural language processing
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Unravel the power of NLP in spotting fake news with various techniques and real-world examples.

item.title: Abracadabra proposes hiking loan interest rate by 200% to manage Curve risk
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The Curve Finance exploit has created a liquidity crisis in the DeFi ecosystem, with several lending protocols rushing to minimize their exposure.
